info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 2:19PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cook County through 300 PM CST... At 218 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hinsdale, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North side of Chicago, Cicero, Evanston, Skokie, Berwyn, Oak Park, Glenview, Park Ridge, Niles, West Town, Austin, Lake View, Irving Park, West Ridge, Lincoln Park, Wilmette, Melrose Park, Maywood and Brookfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
